Package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.mullier.sesc

Class Competitor

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.mullier.sesc.Competitor
public class Competitor extends Object
class representing a Competitor a competitor belongs to a cycle league and can have points allocated for events they've competed in and be attached to Awards that they've won.
